PowerShell.name: dotnet /core
PowerShell.description: .NET news, announcements, release notes, and more!

PowerShell.zh_des: 克里斯·提图斯技术公司的Windows实用程序-安装程序、调整、修复和更新
PowerShell.name: ChrisTitusTech /winutil
PowerShell.description: Chris Titus Tech's Windows Utility - Install Programs, Tweaks, Fixes, and Updates

PowerShell.zh_des: 一个简单，易于使用的PowerShell脚本，可以从Windows中删除预装的应用程序，禁用遥测，从Windows搜索中删除必应，以及执行各种其他更改以整理和改善您的Windows体验。此脚本适用于Windows 10和Windows 11。
PowerShell.name: Raphire /Win11Debloat
PowerShell.description: A simple, easy to use PowerShell script to remove pre-installed apps from windows, disable telemetry, remove Bing from windows search as well as perform various other changes to declutter and improve your windows experience. This script works for both windows 10 and windows 11.

PowerShell.zh_des: Microsoft社区Windows包管理器清单存储库
PowerShell.name: microsoft /winget-pkgs
PowerShell.description: The Microsoft community Windows Package Manager manifest repository

PowerShell.zh_des: 用于构建精简版Windows 11映像的脚本。
PowerShell.name: ntdevlabs /tiny11builder
PowerShell.description: Scripts to build a trimmed-down Windows 11 image.

PowerShell.zh_des: Microsoft Copilot for Security是一款高效的人工智能支持的安全解决方案，有助于提高防御者的效率和能力，从而在机器速度和规模上改善安全结果，同时遵守负责任的人工智能原则
PowerShell.name: Azure /Copilot-For-Security
PowerShell.description: Microsoft Copilot for Security is a generative AI-powered security solution that helps increase the efficiency and capabilities of defenders to improve security outcomes at machine speed and scale, while remaining compliant to responsible AI principles
